Ful-stack Developer | Male | 22/06/1990
Kinh Nghiệm Làm
Việc
6 năm
Công ty gần đây nhất
Ful-stack Developer tại Công ty TNHH
Công ty TNHH
MTV Phần mềm Auvietsoft

Cử nhân
Ngôn ngữ
English
English - Trung cấp

Điện thoại
0899167795
Địa chỉ
21/1/10 Lý Thường Kiệt, Phường 4,
Quận Gò Vấp, Tp HCM, Quận Gò
Vấp, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
THÔNG TIN CHUNG
I was a student of the Science University. I graduated in October
2013.
I can work alone or team-work well.
Research new technology fast.
Responsibility with my work doing.
I often listen music, travelling when I have free-time.
I am saturate, friendly, laborious.
KỸ NĂNG
KỸ NĂNG
Entity Framework
Web Service
Macro Excel VBA
KINH NGHIỆM LÀM VIỆC
06/2017 - Present
Ful-stack Developer
Công ty TNHH MTV Phần mềm Auvietsoft
Receive requests from the customer. Then, analyze requirement
with the manager. Create tables for compatibility. After, code
module with language C# using Entity Framework 6, AutoMapper to
mapping database into object that can use in Front-end.  The
modules that I worked in company, such as: - Price Quotation:
module for end-user can input price of offer product. The quotation
will repeat again until both agree with price. Quotation will change
status is confirm. Besides, when any things end-user can quote price
again. - Work Order: module for end-user can input process to
produce, create BOM, create Delivery Note, create Receivng Note -
Factory Specification & Client Specification: Two screen help end-
user chat to report quality of product and confirm price to buy.
11/2016 - 06/2017
.Net Developer
K&G Technology
Build web application run on Ipod device. This is system
management that using scan product, search product, scan return
and scan shipping all everything process on Ipod device. Web
application must be run browser Chrome.
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2000, Visual Studio 2013.
Technology used for the projects as MVC4, Ajax, Jquery, 3Layers.
Coding languages as C#
Run IIS 6.0
Besides, I joined Tanaka project, my working in the project that
fixing bug about UI support to release product on-times.
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2014, Visual Studio 2015.
Technology used for the projects as 3Layers.
Coding languages as C#.
04/2014 - 05/2016
Software Engineer
Aureole Information Technology Inc.(AIT)
After finsihed Fujinet’s training, I applied in Aureole Information
Technology in April 2014.
The first project that I worked. That is BTMV-Pharse 1.
       About BTMV-Pharse 1 such as:
My group had 4 members such as 1 Sub PM, 1 Translator, 2 PG. The
project progressed about 3 months. In this pharse, we coded in
handy terminal, that meaned user would use to check quality of tire
that produced in Bridgestone factory in Hai Phong city.
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2012, Visual Studio 2008.
Technology used for project as Web Services(WSDL).
.Net Framework 3.5, Windows CE.
Coding language as VB.Net.
Run Web Services to deloy as IIS 7.5.
       After BTMV-Pharse 1 was BTMV-Pharse 2, about BTMV-Pharse
2:
Our task was convert Bridgestone System Management from VB6 to
VB.Net and Oracle 10g to SQL Server 2014. So, quantity work in the
project very large, we lost 4 months to finshed this project. We had
many the problem in convert Oracle to SQL Server. The query
statement, we could fix syntax to SQL Server could run well.
Besides, we needed writing all store procedure.
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2014, Visual Studio 2008.
Technology used for project as nothing.
.Net Framework 3.5.
Coding language as VB.Net.
       At time, with BTMV-Pharse 2, I worked project Eiken-Kintai.
About Eiken-Kintai:
This was a project of the Japanese customer, they used project to
manage staff in the company, time-in and time-out with rules of
company, calendar for user see and applied absence days of
themselves, etc…
We used tools to develop as Eclipse Indigo, PL/SQL(Oracle SQL
Developer).
Technology used for project as Struts1, Hibernate.
Jre 1.6(Jre 1.5), Oracle 11g2.
Coding language as Java.
Run Server to deloy as Oracle OC4J Standalone Server.
       Parallel with Eiken-Kintai, I worked the project standard Kintai.
About Kintai:
This is the standard project to improve for the other project for
Japanese customers. System manage all staff from absence days,
overtime days, calculate salary of staff, all offline days staff,
manage project, manage task and mange time to progress
project(tracking), etc…
We used tools to develop as Eclipse Indigo, PL/SQL(Oracle SQL
Developer).
Technology used for project as Struts1, Hibernate.
Jre 1.6(Jre 1.5), Oracle 11g2.
Coding language as Java.
Run Server to deloy as Oracle OC4J Standalone Server.
       After finished Eiken-Kintai, I build project Barcode System
Management. About Barcode System Management:
This is project to manage boxes in factory. Users will use 2
applications. One is application run on desktop, two is application
run handy terminal. With application run on desktop, user can create,
update, delete data master. With all data master, user will create
information barcode then paste all boxes and move to Quanlity
Check part to check after continue move to Finished Goods to
create the Shipment Request and tranfer boxes to the comsumers.
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2012, Visual Studio 2008.
Technology used for project as Web Services(WSDL).
.Net Framework 3.5, Windows CE.
Coding language as VB.Net.
Run Web Services to deloy as IIS 7.5.
And some small project that I worked in the company such as:
PRONES is accounting software, use coding language VB.Net and
IIS 7.5 to use connect database Oracle.
Kintai .NET: One web application used to manage employee, salary,
project of company and estimate of tasks in the project, coded by
C# use technology PhoneGap, AngularJS, Web API,
EntityFramework 6.0. I spent 6 months from 11/2015 to 5/2016
10/2013 - 01/2014
Intership
Fujinet Systems JSC
I joined Fujinet’s training.
At here, I worked in a .Net team. We buildttraining project about
management time of staff in company.
I coded display calendar for administrator.
With user is administrator, they could see time-in and time-out of a
staff. Besides, they could holiday, Tet holiday, etc…
We used tools to develop as SQL Server 2008, Visual Studio 2008.
Technology used for project as 3-Layers.
.Net Framework 3.5.
Coding language as VB.Net.
HỌC VẤN
11/2008 - 10/2013
Công nghệ phần mềm - Công nghệ thông tin
Cử nhân - Trường Đại học Khoa Học Tự Nhiên - Đại học Quốc Gia
Tp HCM
Phát triển phần mềm quản lý sách cho thư viện của trường
THÔNG TIN THAM KHẢO
Trần Trung Hậu
Đồng nghiệp tại Công ty TNHH MTV Phần mềm Âu Việt Soft
hau.tran@auvietsoft.vn | 0984735590
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
